#    https://github.com/Statemood/dockerfiles

FROM statemood/jre:8u151

LABEL MAINTAINER="Lin Ru <Lin.Ru@msn.com>"

COPY run.sh     /

RUN apk update	                    && \
     apk upgrade	                && \
     n="sonarqube"                  && \
     v="7.1" && \
     curl -f -sLO https://sonarsource.bintray.com/Distribution/$n/$n-$v.zip && \
     unzip -q $n-$v.zip && \
     mv $n-$v $n && \
     adduser sonar -D && \
     chmod 755 /run.sh && \
     apk add --no-cache bash && \
     rm -rf $n/extensions $n/data $n-$v.zip && \
     chown -R sonar:sonar /$n

ENTRYPOINT ["/run.sh"]
